turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi how can I help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to place a drink order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: With starbucks or with peets?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it and which one is closest to where you want to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up at the Starbucks on 627 Tremont Street Retail Space No. 1 in Boston, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'm sorry there was a little static on my end could you repeat that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, so I'd like to pick up my drink order from Starbucks on 627 Tremont Street retail space 1, Austin, Massachusetts.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it and what will you be ordering?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order a black and white mocha.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you want that iced or regular?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. And what kind of milk did you want?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so that's a black and white grande mocha with 2% milk and whipped cream for pickup at the starbuckso n Treemont St.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: YOu'll get the reciept via mobile in just a bit. It'll be ready for pickup in 14 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good day! Take care.
